name: Tobacco Vapor Electronic Cigarette Association
goal: The Tobacco Vapor Electronic Cigarette Association (TVECA) is a 501(c)(6), a not-for-profit trade organization. The TVECA is an association of private sector companies engaged in electronic cigarette technologies. Member companies are involved in all sectors of the creation and promotion of electronic cigarettes. The TVECA’s mission is to provide the tools and information necessary for policy-makers, opinion leaders, media and private sector companies worldwide to make informed decisions about the management and use of electronic cigarette technologies, particularly the most recent advances and applications. The association was founded to institute and promote industry-wide standards and a code of conduct, work to maintain sound professional practices, educate the public and policy-makers on the industry’s activities and potential and ensure the ethical use of electronic cigarette technologies.
